actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

official_title: To require the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System to collect, publish, and keep current an objective index of dollar-denominated loan interest rates of various maturities, and for other purposes.

summary.text:
Rate of Average Time Execution Act of 2015 or the RATE Act of 2015

Amends the Federal Reserve Act to direct the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System to collect, publish, and keep current a set of indices, meeting specified criteria, that report the rate for dollar-denominated loans of various maturities.

titles.title: Rate of Average Time Execution Act of 2015

To require the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System to collect, publish, and keep current an objective index of dollar-denominated loan interest rates of various maturities, and for other purposes.
